title: Been looking for a while now,,,
body: But does anyone know where if there is a full-sized un-cropped version of this image? My wife's favorite thing about League is Poro's and she would love this as a desktop background!

replies.body:
Posting a link to the full download here: https://imgur.com/a/dukkR

Enjoy! ^_^

Totally forgot that I had posted this! Thank you so much! =D
i want a summoner icon for that Poro Ahri
I've poked some poro fanatics about this, so maybe they'll be able to sniff it out :3
